QuestData.Title: Cutter
QuestData.Description: You found many Laughing Skulls. All friends, all loved, all dead. But you did not find my precious Cutter.$b$bThey must have taken him to Evermorn Springs.$b$bFind him, and rescue him.$b$bHe is a good boy, and deserves a better death than infesting.$b$bI am going to round up some ravagers and take the place by air. Look for me in Evermorn if you find Cutter before I do.
QuestData.RewardText: The botani took my dad. They took my friends. And now they are making me eat fruit!$b$bWhy are they so mean?!$b$bDid you kill them all?$b$bI think you should kill them.
